row.process:
:SET &UC4RB_SQL_SEPARATOR# = "," :SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = "exp &UC4RB_DB_USERNAME#/&UC4RB_DB_PASSWORD_TMP#"
:IF &UC4RB_DB_SID# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#, "@&UC4RB_DB_SID#") :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_DB_IMP_INVOKE_AS_SYSDBA# = "YES" : IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "UNIX" : IF &UC4RB_DB_SID# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = "exp userid=\'" : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#,'&UC4RB_DB_USERNAME#/&UC4RB_DB_PASSWORD_TMP#') : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#,'@&UC4RB_DB_SID# AS SYSDBA') : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#,"\'") : ENDIF : ENDIF : IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "WINDOWS" : IF &UC4RB_DB_SID# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = "exp userid='" : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#,'&UC4RB_DB_USERNAME#/&UC4RB_DB_PASSWORD_TMP#') : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#,'@&UC4RB_DB_SID# AS SYSDBA') : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#,"'") : ENDIF : ENDIF :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_DB_EXPMODE_FULL# = "YES" : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#, " FULL = Y") :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_DB_EXPMODE_OWNER_LIST# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#, " OWNER = &UC4RB_DB_EXPMODE_OWNER_LIST#") :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_DB_EXPMODE_TABLE_LIST# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#, " TABLES = &UC4RB_DB_EXPMODE_TABLE_LIST#") :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_DB_EXPMODE_TS_LIST# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#, " TABLESPACES = &UC4RB_DB_EXPMODE_TS_LIST#") : IF &UC4RB_DB_EXPMODE_TRANSP_TS# = "NO" : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#, " TRANSPORT_TABLESPACE = N") : ENDIF : IF &UC4RB_DB_EXPMODE_TTS_FULLCHECK# = "YES" : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#, " TTS_FULL_CHECK = Y") : ELSE : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#, " TTS_FULL_CHECK = N") : ENDIF :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_DB_EXPOPT_FILES# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#, " FILE = &UC4RB_DB_EXPOPT_FILES#") :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_DB_EXPOPT_FILESIZE# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#, " FILESIZE = &UC4RB_DB_EXPOPT_FILESIZE#") :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_DB_EXPOPT_VOLSIZE# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#, " VOLSIZE = &UC4RB_DB_EXPOPT_VOLSIZE#") :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_DB_EXPOPT_LOGFILE# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#, " LOG = &UC4RB_DB_EXPOPT_LOGFILE#") :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_DB_EXPOPT_RECORDLENGTH# <> "0" OR "" : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#, " RECORDLENGTH = &UC4RB_DB_EXPOPT_RECORDLENGTH#") :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_DB_EXPOPT_BUFFER# <> "0" OR "" : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#, " BUFFER = &UC4RB_DB_EXPOPT_BUFFER#") :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_DB_EXPOPT_STATISTICS# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#, " STATISTICS = &UC4RB_DB_EXPOPT_STATISTICS#") :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_DB_EXPOPT_COMPRESS# = "YES" : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#, " COMPRESS = Y") :ELSE : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#, " COMPRESS = N") :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_DB_EXPOPT_ROWS# = "YES" : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#, " ROWS = Y") :ELSE : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#, " ROWS = N") :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_DB_EXPOPT_DIRECT# = "YES" : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#, " DIRECT = Y") :ELSE : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#, " DIRECT = N") :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_DB_EXPOPT_INDEXES# = "YES" : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#, " INDEXES = Y") :ELSE : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#, " INDEXES = N") :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_DB_EXPOPT_CONSTRAINTS# = "YES" : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#, " CONSTRAINTS = Y") :ELSE : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#, " CONSTRAINTS = N") :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_DB_EXPOPT_GRANTS# = "YES" : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#, " GRANTS = Y") :ELSE : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#, " GRANTS = N") :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_DB_EXPOPT_TRIGGERS# = "YES" : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#, " TRIGGERS = Y") :ELSE : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#, " TRIGGERS = N") :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_DB_EXPOPT_CONSISTENT# = "YES" : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#, " CONSISTENT = Y") :ELSE : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#, " CONSISTENT = N") :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_DB_EXPOPT_OBJ_CONSISTENT# = "YES" : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#, " OBJECT_CONSISTENT = Y") :ELSE : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#, " OBJECT_CONSISTENT = N") :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_DB_EXPOPT_RESUMABLE# = "YES" : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#, " RESUMABLE = Y") : IF &UC4RB_DB_EXPOPT_RESUMABLE_NAME# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#, " RESUMABLE_NAME = '&UC4RB_DB_EXPOPT_RESUMABLE_NAME#'") : ENDIF : IF &UC4RB_DB_EXPOPT_RSMBL_TIMEOUT# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#, " RESUMABLE_TIMEOUT = &UC4RB_DB_EXPOPT_RSMBL_TIMEOUT#") : ENDIF
:ELSE : SET &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#, " RESUMABLE = N") :ENDIF :PRINT &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND# &UC4RB_SCRIPT_COMMAND#
